did.unittitle: Kan-no, Shigeru. Cadance 24 Variations Without Theme, WVE-167f

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score, 1 CD, 1 program note. Notes: Program notes are in a combination of English, French and German. Note on envelope: KS1.1 .00, KS1.2 .04, KS1.3 .04.
